review: The fire stick plays the movies from my flixster account. Easy to set up. Easy to use.
author: Jeffrey S Winig

review: Easy set up. Intuitive remote. Please note the stick portion has to be continually powered. Love it.
author: Jeff

review: Cut the cable cord and now I use this. I love it.
author: Michael

review: Decent idea, but one of the things I didn't catch until AFTER I received it was the clunky AC power supply.  A little dissapointed, but it works like its supposed to.
author: M. T. Clark "M T C"

review: good stuff just need HBO to go
author: Amazon Customer

review: The fire TV stick was everything and more. I use this on a daily basis and totally dropped my co***st cable company. There's no need for cable once you purchase the fire tv stick!!! I love it.
author: Anthony Sammons

review: so far so good, still investigating all the options open to me.
author: Lauriane

review: I love it..Its easy to set up and works in less than 5 minutes..I love this device..i see my self buying a 2nd one and i told everyone i know about it .
